text:
Hi there!
Nice, that blog tags are translatable now!
Is there a way to fetch available language variants of a blog tag via Hubl?

Not yet - we still have to make some updates to the publicly available APIs for multi-language blog features. I’ll make sure the engineers know about the need for Tag variants, if they weren’t planning on that already!

If you’re using the multi-language feature in HubSpot, each page will have the right `hreflang alternate` tags. I’ve never heard of something similar being needed for sitemaps in particular - the on-page tags are the ones you want to focus on.
